summary: CONSUMER WAS HAVING PROBLEMS WITH THE STEERING WHILE DRIVING,  IT  CAUSED A CAR ACCIDENT.  MANUFACTURER WAS NOT CONTACTED AT THE TIME OF THIS CALL.  DEALER WAS  CONTACTED, AND STATED  THEY COULD NOT FIND ANYTHING WRONG WITH THE VEHICLE.   *AK   THE CONSUMER'S WIFE WAS DRIVING THE VEHICLE WHEN SUDDENLY THE STEERING WHEEL COULD NOT BE CONTROLLED, THE VEHICLE HAD GONE BACK AND FORTH AND CAUSED HER TO HIT THE TIRES OF THE SEMI.   *SCC    *JB
